Teaching

In this page you will find everything related to my teaching experiences. The ability to learn and inspire people has always fascinated me. This is why I love Teaching and I’ve been always committed to it.

Brief Summary

In this section you can find a brief summary of all my teaching experiences. In the near future I plan to add more content for each course but in the meantime you can take a look at the official website of each course where you’ll find slides, code, talks and exercises you can freely use!

Teaching assistant of the course Machine Learning
Università di Bolgna / University of Bologna. October 2016 – Present (three academic years).

Teaching assistant of the course Computer Architectures
Università di Bolgna / University of Bologna. October 2015 – Present (four academic years).

Teaching assistant of the course Parallel Computing
Università di Modena e Reggio Emilia / University of Modena and Reggio Emilia. October 2015 – March 2016 (one academic year).

Teaching assistant of the course Fundamentals of Computer Science
Università di Bologna / University of Bologna. March 2014 – March 2016 (two academic year).
